page.title: 18A LOCAL SHOPKEEPER SPEAKS.
page.content: He sells vegetables, citrus fruit, bananas, grapes and confectionery. He used to go around selling door to door but now finds business good enough to stay in one place.His business has grown quickly over the last ten years and is still growing. He has two Transit vans and a large lorry.He has three shops in all.He has a staff of about 18 people and they all work part-time.He has no intention of moving areas and finds business good in all of his shops. His best selling vegetable is the potato. Selling is easier now than when he started the business because people have more money to spend.Another point might be that less people grow their own vegetables today than in years ago.
